amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the Department of Justice from interfering with tribal cannabis programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
